Item: Supported Protocols (for additional protocols, see the xref:RoadViewALPR:DocList.adoc[ {software-ALPR-long} User Guide]
Specification: LPR Events are reported via protocols such as the {compname-short} HTTP API protocol. Each LPR Event includes metadata and associated images.

The {compname-short} Discovery Protocol is used by the {software-discovery} utility to find all devices connected to the LAN. {software-discovery} also enables display and editing of each device's network settings.
